subject: p15114531
History: Evaluation of the patient after intubation.
Findings: AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed. The ET tube tip has been inserted with its tip being 6 cm above the carina. Dilatation of the trachea after intubation might reflect overinflation of the endotracheal tube cuff. Left retrocardiac consolidation is new, most likely reflecting atelectasis/aspiration. There is no appreciable pleural effusion or pneumothorax seen.
